Name: Crowne Plaza Antalya
Description:
Enjoy a fascinating holiday experience with the unique beauty of the Mediterranean Sea. We invite you to the world-renowned Konyaalti Beach surrounded by the deep blue sea and the Taurus Mountains. 
You can enjoy peace in the hot summer months while you swim on the clean beaches of the unique Konyaalti Beach with a blue flag. 
As soon as you arrive to Crowne Plaza Antalya, the smiling and professional teams will be ready to welcome you and help you have a great holiday. 
You can also view the matchless landscape of Antalya using the Tunektepe Aerial Tramway next to the hotel. You can watch the sunset and the Beydag Mountains on the terrace of the Neapolis Fine Dining on the 10th floor. 
Only 23 kilometers away from the airport, you can easily reach the hotel and discover the narrow streets of the ancient city where you can see historical monuments with a 15-minute drive. 
Charming everyone who loves to do sports anytime they want, Crowne Plaza Antalya offers a wide range of choices with indoor and outdoor swimming pools, gyms furnished with sports equipment, and 7 kilometers of beach and running track lying right before the hotel. 
The resting pool, Turkish bath and Finnish sauna in the SPA center will help you refresh yourself and relax your soul. 
The hotel has a car park area, and you can apply to the valet services offered by the hotel. 
Invite your friends to the meeting rooms in Crowne Plaza Antalya.
